patthana23.6:4.1: Nakusalaṃ napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.6:4.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana23.6:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.6:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana23.6:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.6:6.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
